title: One Must Carry Out Justice, Together

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Boss, I've bought some yakisoba.
Let's eat it together.
choice_data_list: Thanks, Meno.

text_block_list.text: It was a day off during summer training. Hoping to give Fenomeno a break from her tireless training, I brought her along to a fireworks show.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
We still have some time before the show starts.
Are there any stalls you'd like to see, Boss?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
There's quite a variety of activities.
Shooting games, die-cutting, and balloon fishing...
...Hmm?
I looked over and saw the staff tent was full of people running back and forth in a tizzy, their expressions disturbed and anxious.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...I've got a bad feeling about this.
Let's see what's going on.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
What!?
Five primary schoolers have gone missing...!?

text_block_list.name: Manager
text_block_list.text: Yes. It seems like they wanted to watch the show away from the crowd, so they went into the woods. We're going to send a search party, but we're short on manpower...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――Boss.
choice_data_list: Can we help with the search?
Can we help with the search?

text_block_list.name: Manager
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? It'd be a huge help for sure, but... Are you sure?
Don't you two want to see the show?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
The safety of the children comes first.
We'll join up with the search party once we change into more suitable clothes.

text_block_list.name: Search Party
text_block_list.text:
――HEYYYYY!! HEYYYYYY!!
――Where are yooooouuu!?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
HEYYYYYYYYY!!
IF YOU CAN HEAR ME, ANSWERRRRRR!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
!!
...Boss.
I've caught the "scent".
choice_data_list: Let's look over there, then.
Let's look over there, then.

text_block_list.text: After checking in with the rest of the search party, we headed into the woods where Fenomeno sensed the "scent". It was dark and hard to see, but she was still hot on their trail.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
――I was right, it's here.
The "scent" is getting stronger.

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: WAAAAAAAAAHHHH...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
!!
Target in sight!!
Following the sound of crying, the two of us found the kids sitting on the ground.
choice_data_list: Are you kids alright!?
Are you kids alright!?

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text:
――Wahhh...!
――Sniff, sniff...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
It doesn't seem like they're hurt, but they seem to be exhausted from... 
Hm?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
One, two, three... four?
Where's the last of you!?

text_block_list.name: Girl A
choice_data_list: WHAT!?
text_block_list.text: Sniff... We lost him... at the river...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Boss. Take these children to a safe place, please. 
And tell the search party to prepare for a potential water rescue, in case of emergency.
choice_data_list: What about you?
What about you?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I'm going to the river to find the last child.

choice_data_list: Are you sure you handle this alone?
Are you sure you handle this alone?
text_block_list.text:
In the worst case scenario, he could've fallen in the river.
We didn't have much time. But...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
I'm grateful for your concern.
But please, leave this to me.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――I can handle it.
choice_data_list: ...Bring him back safe. No matter what.
...Bring him back safe. No matter what.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Copy!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Huff...! Huff...!
The river... It's this way!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
(The damp smell of water... I'm getting close!
But the "scent" of danger is getting stronger, too...!)

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text: Somebody... help me... Cough, cough!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
(Kgh!! He's barely hanging onto that rock...!!
Can I get to him in time...!?)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: (...No, I can!! I promised Boss!! That I would bring that boy back safe!!)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
(I WILL save you!! 
I swear in the names of justice and Boss――!!)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: RRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAGGGGGGHHHHHHHH!!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I'VE GOT YOUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU!!

choice_data_list: Want some coffee?
text_block_list.text: Vending machine coffee in hand, I went over to the beach near the cabin. Fenomeno was there, staring out into the ocean.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Yes. Much obliged.
...Phew. It's profoundly satisfying.
text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
choice_data_list: Must be because of a job well done.
Must be because of a job well done.

text_block_list.text: The missing children were brought back to the search party, safe and sound. And Fenomeno had returned, covered in mud, with the last of the missing children on her back.

It didn't seem like the kid suffered any major injuries. 
After a bit of treatment, he was sent home safely.

choice_data_list: Guess we'll have to miss the fireworks.
Guess we'll have to miss the fireworks.
text_block_list.text: We'd gone back to the cabin to change out of our dirtied clothes, but by the time we did, it'd gotten pretty late...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Mmhm. But this was still a day well spent.
I got to protect another precious future, after all.
choice_data_list: Yeah. You sure did.
Yeah. You sure did.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Boss... I'd like to thank you.
For believing in me, and trusting me to find him.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
That trust carried me forward, to the very end.
Driving me to complete my mission――
And to live up to your expectations.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Not only did you teach me how to conquer my weakness...
You also gave me the power to make my ideal justice a reality.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: You're the greatest Boss I could ever ask for!
I felt my eyes well up in the face of her sincerity.

It was then that I made a silent vow.
To live up to the faith she put in me.
To do everything I could to keep being a good "Boss" for her.
(Boom! Boom, boom!)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Over there...!
choice_data_list: The fireworks...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Haha...
So we can see them, even here.

She looked up at the sky, eyes on the fireworks.
Seeing her face, I gave her a pat on the back.
choice_data_list: Let's keep on protecting those futures.
Let's keep on protecting those futures.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Affirmative, Boss!!
